response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its high quality and unique features, the product is worth $800,000 to you based on your needs. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and includes a comprehensive warranty and dedicated customer support for the first year. I trust this proposal aligns well with your budget and strategic goals. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
